title: Adam Yates Eyes Vuelta a España Leadership as Tadej Pogačar Chases the Giro-Tour Double
content:
No complications, no drama from Yates for 2024: 'I train hard, I work hard, and I show up to the races that are on my calendar and try to win.'

Read the full article at Adam Yates Eyes Vuelta a España Leadership as Tadej Pogačar Chases the Giro-Tour Double on Velo.
author: ahood
